question_stem:
In the topic on One-Way ANOVA, we worked with the heifers dataset. The following is the SAS output.

SAS output

The value of 0.5908 corresponds to ∑i=1k∑j=1ni(Yi¯−Y¯¯)2 \sum_{i=1}^k \sum_{j=1}^{n_i} \left( \overline{Y_i} - \overline{\overline{Y}} \right)^2

items.solution: The indicated expression is for the SS_between. In the table it is referred to as the Model SS.
